name: Space Grounds
description:
Little Prefaction
This game is made for the Stop Waiting For Godot Jam.
In this August i've studied Godot for a bit and I saw the Jam like a Final Exam for my study.
It's a bit buggy so if you find something dont esitate to comment!

The game:
The game is a coffee themed Bullet-Hell / Shot Em Up.
You can shot to enemy and after some point you'll face the main boss.
No power up intend for this version, maybe in a next update i can add some.

Controls:

  • Keboyard :
    WASD or ArrowKey for movemen
    SpaceBar for fire
  • Controller:
    ArrowKey or Analog Stick SX for movement
    Button Down for fire

Long press the fire button for charge the shot


Credits
Thanks to

  • Kerrie Lake for the Space Electrician Font on his Kerrie Lake Pixel Font Pack
  • Dfane for the game's pixel art
